Social media rumors: The claim originated from a rumor circulating on social media platforms like Twitter and Facebook. The earliest tweet mentioning the claim was dated April 1, 2016.
Lack of supplementary links: The rumor spread without many supplementary links or sources to support it, making it purely speculative buzz.
Plausibility based on popularity and con: The popularity of the movie Frozen and the age of the Twilight Zone attraction (Tower of Terror) lent some plausibility to the rumor.
Parody post: The claim was ultimately debunked as a parody post, not affiliated with the Walt Disney Company. The post was fake news, and the source explicitly stated it was a parody account.
